name: Cat Boy's Stellar Journey
description:
Cat Boy's Stellar Journey

Join cat boy as he travels through the stars on his way to meet his sister.  Along the way, relax at a hot spring and pick flowers in a meadow.    Cat Boy's Stellar Journey is a tiny adventure game about traveling and the things we leave behind...

Created for the exploration summer slow jam hosted by Portland Indie Game Squad.   Play in browser or download the rom to play on any compatible gameboy emulator. Or use a flash cart and play in your gameboy.

Content Warning

This is a game about saying goodbye.

Controls

move with arrows or wasd
z to interact
x to cancel

Credits

art/code/writing:  cloverfirefly
music: LydianChord
special thanks: npckc
additional fonts: chevy rae
made with gb studio

If you like the music, please consider supporting LydianChord on bandcamp!

CONTENT WARNING:
This is a game about saying goodbye and contains references to pet death
